beer.beer_description: If Krampus were a beer-drinking man – er, goat-demon… thing – we imagine this is what he’d pop open to slake his thirst after a hard Yuletide terrifying children. Full-bodied with a dry finish, expect a delicately roasty chocolatey coffee and caramalt skeleton, topped with horns of citrus and piney resin… in short, a devilishly good drop to pack your sack with!

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 375 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 76! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

With a bitter bite and a toasted maltiness, this dark style is a perfect combination to be enjoyed any time, day or night. That's 10 different beers with the style of IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 490 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 99! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

At first taste, dark ales can be overwhelming for even the most skilled of beer drinkers, but your will is weak and with time you will eventually turn to the dark side. That's 100 different beers with the style of Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Lager - Dark, IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black, Schwarzbier, or Mild - Dark. Try 5 more for Level 21!
